CVE-2018-15919.summary: Remotely observable behaviour in auth-gss2.c in OpenSSH through 7.8 could be used by remote attackers to detect existence of users on a target system when GSS2 is in use. NOTE: the discoverer states 'We understand that the OpenSSH developers do not want to treat such a username enumeration (or "oracle") as a vulnerability.'

CVE-2017-15906.summary: The process_open function in sftp-server.c in OpenSSH before 7.6 does not properly prevent write operations in readonly mode, which allows attackers to create zero-length files.

Contact Us

  • Tell your story. Get it published.

    Successfully launch your product, division, or company. 

    Services >

  • Rise above your competition

    Increase mind and market share with C-Suite decision makers.

    Contact Us >

  • Reach the right decision makers

    With 165,00 healthcare apps and over 5,000 HIT companies, it's a tough market.

    About Us >

We provide our marketing expertise to leading companies in these sectors:

Healthcare information technology (HIT) companies
Laboratory
Diagnostics
Healthcare device
manufacturers
Healthcare
Providers
Wireless and
mobile health vendors
Healthcare
Payers
Pharmaceuticals/
Biopharmaceuticals

About Us >

Expanding a Telehealth Program to Serve More Patients

By Mitch Work, MPA, FHIMSS

The 30-day readmission rate for heart failure patients who participated in one health system’s telemonitoring program went from 16% in 2014 to 5.1% in 2015 to just 3% in 2016. Results like this simply cannot be ignored. They must be celebrated—and, more importantly, replicated.

Read More >

Testimonials

  • "I’ve been working with healthcare IT media for the last 15 years, and I can’t count the number of times The Work Group has come through by delivering great sources for stories and speakers for conferences. Mitch knows the industry better than anyone and is respected by everyone in the media for his knowledge and contacts. There’s no one I trust more to find hospital and vendor executives who have great stories to tell."

    Greg Gillespie

    Content Consultant, Former Editor-in-Chief, Health Data Management Magazine

  • "I have known Mitch Work professionally for nearly 20 years. He is a consummate professional, and one of the most skilled public relations and marketing people in health care whom I know. He always brings me the most pertinent and useful information, and the most relevant, helpful people to speak with. I am delighted to recognize him for his contributions to health care communications in general."

    Mark Hagland

    Editor-in-Chief, Healthcare Informatics

  • "The Work Group was instrumental in launching Care Fusion and our products at HIMSS and in writing compelling market collateral and case studies that helped communicate our value proposition to the healthcare industry. The result? Care Fusion was successfully acquired by Cardinal Health within 24 months. I highly recommend The Work Group, Inc. for any marketing, marketing communications and public relations projects. They deliver."

    Rob Finizio

    Co-Founder and VP Sales, Care Fusion

  • "Mitch, I wanted to thank you for the effort that you put forth in assisting me in writing a Tier 1, winning article for the HIMSS/ASQ Stories of Success program. The submission was recognized as an exemplary model for others to understand the importance of workflow redesign prior to HIT implementation. Your skillful guidance in writing this paper is, in my opinion, one of the major reasons for Bassett’s success in winning this prestigious recognition."

    Kathleen V. Brooks, PA

    Administrative Director, Anesthesia & Surgical Support Services, Bassett Healthcare Network

  • "Mitch possesses a deep knowledge of healthcare IT and also has excellent relationships with healthcare trade publications, consultants, trade associations and the vendor community. Mitch has spoken at many of our healthcare conferences. I view him as a valued advisor to the company; he has helped us to organize many innovative events over the years."

    Satish Kavirajan

    Managing Director, The Center for Business Innovation

Compete more effectively in today's crowded and complex healthcare IT marketplace.

Reach the right people
Your company needs a multichannel marketing strategy focusing on industry press and social media campaigns enabling you to reach your target audience.
Be Seen by the right people
Gain visibility with the healthcare C-suite by conveying success stories about even the most complex IT products. Place these stories in top industry publications to get the attention of the right decision makers.
Get to know the right people
With 25 years of experience and personal relationships with editors and publishers of the leading healthcare IT publications, The Work Group is uniquely positioned to help you gain a competitive edge.
Our Services >

Our Partners

The Work Group is pleased to present the following partners with whom we collaborate on a regular basis to ensure our clients success. These companies collectively represent hundreds of years of experience in healthcare IT.

  •  
  •  

Why Us?

Marketing and sales of healthcare technology has never been more challenging, complex or chaotic. To succeed in an era of consumer-driven healthcare, value-based care and population health, you need an experienced healthcare marketing team.

We are a full service healthcare technology marketing agency offering comprehensive marketing communications, public relations and sales services. We will help you successfully navigate this fast changing ecosystem.

Contact Us >
